title: Societies Act 1893 for a certain period and such other period (if any) as may be
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Industrial and Provident Societies Act
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Industrial and Provident Societies Act 

1893 (Section 14A(1)) (Covid-19) Order 2023. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited industrial provident society act 1893 (section 14a(1)) (covid-19) order 2023 (2) order come operation 1 january 2024

title: Societies Act 1893 for a certain period and such other period (if any) as may be
heading: In this Order, “Act of 2020” means the Companies (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2020” means the Companies (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) (Covid-19) Act 2020 (No. 9 of 2020).
text_norm: 2 order act 2020 mean company (miscellaneous provisions) (covid-19) act 2020 (no 9 2020)

title: Societies Act 1893 for a certain period and such other period (if any) as may be
heading: 3. The period beginning on 1 January 2024 and ending on 31 December
text_raw:
3. The period beginning on 1 January 2024 and ending on 31 December 
2024 is hereby specified as the period to which the interim period as defined in 
section 79 (amended by section 29 of the Act of 2020) of the Industrial and 
Provident Societies Act 1893 (56 & 57 Vict., c.39) shall be extended in respect 
of the amendments effected by Part 3 of the Act of 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

12 December, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach.
